component.name: org.nuxeo.ecm.platform.semanticentities.RemoteEntityService
component.documentation: The RemoteEntityService service provides a generic way to register linked data sources to lookup up and download attributes of entity definitions from a remote server such as DBpedia for instance.

extension-point.name: remoteSources
extension-point.documentation:
The service accepts the registration of parameterized remote sources connectors:
http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Person http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Organization http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Place
